maneuver_gear.tooltip.sword_blade_1: Shift right click to put this blade in the left holster
maneuver_gear.tooltip.sword_blade_2: Regular right click to put this blade in the right holster
maneuver_gear.tooltip.3d_maneuver_handle: Used to operate the 3D Maneuver Gear
maneuver_gear.tooltip.more_info: Instructions available in advanced tooltip (F3 + H)
maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_left_normal: Use <LMB> to attack with left sword
maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_right_norma: Use <RMB> to attack with right sword
maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_left_sprint: Use <ctrl> + <LMB> to apply a blade to the left handle
maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_right_sprin: Use <ctrl> + <RMB> to apply a blade to the right handle
maneuver_gear.tooltip.fall_boots_1: These boots are equipped with shock dampers, connected to the 3d maneuver gear, making it less painful to hit the ground at higher velocities, however, this only works when 3d maneuver gear is equipped as well.
maneuver_gear.tooltip.fall_boots_2: (Can be applied to other pairs of boots to integrate the shock absorbers in them)
maneuver_gear.tooltip.fall_boots_imbued: 3D Maneuver Gear shock dampers have been integrated.
